instruction: Find all nodes with the label 'prey':
input: CREATE (:Node {name: 'Forest', type: 'environment'}),(:Node {name: 'Tiger', type: 'predator'}),(:Node {name: 'Deer', type: 'prey'}),(:Node {name: 'Rabbit', type: 'prey'}),(:Node {name: 'Grass', type: 'vegetation'});MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Forest'}), (target:Node {name: 'Tiger'})CREATE (source)-[:INHABITS]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Forest'}), (target:Node {name: 'Deer'})CREATE (source)-[:INHABITS]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Forest'}), (target:Node {name: 'Rabbit'})CREATE (source)-[:INHABITS]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Forest'}), (target:Node {name: 'Grass'})CREATE (source)-[:GROWS]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Tiger'}), (target:Node {name: 'Deer'})CREATE (source)-[:PREDATOR_OF]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Tiger'}), (target:Node {name: 'Rabbit'})CREATE (source)-[:PREDATOR_OF]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Deer'}), (target:Node {name: 'Grass'})CREATE (source)-[:EATS]->(target);MATCH (source:Node {name: 'Rabbit'}), (target:Node {name: 'Grass'})CREATE (source)-[:EATS]->(target);
